description.@en: There is a rule for every action on the battlefield, and it took you years to master all those subtle rules, no matter how esoteric.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Warfare Tests. When you succeed, it is always considered a Critical Success. In addition, whenever the GM intends to spend a Misfortune Point against you, roll a 1D6 Chaos Die. If the result is face ‘6’, they must use two Misfortune Points instead of one.
